feed.title: Robin Wiethüchter
feed.subtitle: Robin Wiethüchter, software engineer and co-founder of Clipmate AI.

entry.title: Clipmate AI
entry.content:
Main developer of Clipmate, an AI bookmark manager.

Together with my co-founder Moritz, I’ve been working on Clipmate for half a year. Our main motivation was the struggle to find what we were looking for among thousands of Twitter bookmarks, web links, and screenshots. We started with an iOS app but are now focussing on a web app that syncs and organizes all of your content.
entry.summary: Main developer of Clipmate, an AI bookmark manager.

entry.title: Side-By-Side Might Win: IEEE VRW 2024 Poster

link.title: Side-By-Side Might Win: IEEE VRW 2024 Poster

entry.content:
Part of my master’s thesis at Carnegie Mellon University was published in IEEE VRW 2024.

Side-By-Side Might Win: Occlusion Negatively Affects The Performance Of Augmented Reality Task Instructions compares different representations for Augmented Reality instructions for a pick & place with lego duplo bricks.
entry.summary: Part of my master’s thesis at Carnegie Mellon University was published in IEEE VRW 2024.

entry.title: Fast Content Placement in 3D Scenes: FLAIRS 2022 Poster

link.title: Fast Content Placement in 3D Scenes: FLAIRS 2022 Poster

entry.content:
My work on Fast Content Placement and Alignment in 3D Scenes for ETH’s Media Technology Center was published in FLAIRS.

Also check out the project on Github
entry.summary: My work on Fast Content Placement and Alignment in 3D Scenes for ETH’s Media Technology Center was published in FLAIRS.
